text: Hastière is a municipality in the Belgian province of Namur. The area has seven sub-municipalities. They are called Hastière-Lavaux, Hermeton-sur-Meuse, Waulsort, Hastière-par-delà, Blaimont, Heer, and Agimont. In 2007, 5278 people lived there. This grew to 5979 by 2018.Wettelijke bevolkig per gemeente op 1 januari 2018 (.xls) It is at 50° 13 North, 04° 49 East. Hastière is on the River Meuse, and its attractions include a church, gardens and the Castle of Freÿr. == References == Category:Municipalities of Namur
title: Hastière
